email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope you're doing well. I’m reaching out regarding your inquiry for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We have a suitable vessel, the MV Ocean Star, available for this route. The vessel has a DWT of 150,000 and an LOA of 280 meters. The starting freight rate we’re quoting is in the low 50s, specifically $50.75 per metric ton. Let me know if this works for you or if you’d like to discuss further. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The vessel details look good, but the freight rate is a bit higher than we were expecting. Would you be able to come down to the mid-40s, say $45.50 per metric ton? Also, could you confirm the laycan dates? Looking forward to your reply. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. Given the current market conditions, $45.50 is a bit tight, but I can offer $48.00 per metric ton as a middle ground. The laycan for the MV Ocean Star is between October 20th and October 25th. Let me know if this works for you. Cheers, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the revised quote. $48.00 is more reasonable, but we’d like to lock in at $47.25 if possible. Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate? We’d like to avoid any surprises. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I can agree to $47.25 per metric ton. The demurrage rate is $15,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if you’re ready to proceed, and I’ll draft the charter party agreement. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $47.25 and the demurrage rate are acceptable. Please go ahead with the charter party agreement. Let’s aim for the earliest laycan date, October 20th. Thanks for your help on this. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear. I’ll prepare the charter party agreement and send it over for your review by end of day. The laycan is confirmed for October 20th to October 25th. Let me know if you need anything else. Best regards, Sarah
